coverLetter.intro: I am writing to express my interest in the position at your company. As a Senior Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience building and scaling digital systems, I bring comprehensive expertise in cloud architecture, platform engineering, and technical leadership.
coverLetter.experience: In my current role at DrAnsay AU-Schein GmbH, I am responsible for platform engineering and cloud architecture for a digital healthcare platform. Previously serving as CTO, I transitioned to a hands-on engineering role to stay closer to technical implementation.
coverLetter.highlight1: Architecting and maintaining microservices infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform
coverLetter.highlight2: Implementing Infrastructure as Code with Pulumi for reproducible deployments
coverLetter.highlight3: Integrating payment systems (PayPal, Adyen) and logistics APIs (Deutsche Post)
coverLetter.highlight4: Technical leadership and mentoring of development teams
coverLetter.skills: My technical profile includes GCP, TypeScript, Next.js, NestJS, Pulumi, and modern CI/CD practices. I am comfortable working in agile teams and solving complex technical challenges.
coverLetter.closing: I look forward to the opportunity to bring my experience and skills to your team and collaborate on innovative solutions.
